name: S.A.S. Assault 1 & 2
overview: The Russian Ambassador has been kidnapped in London by a gang of terrorists. The Kremlin regards this as an act of aggression and will declare war unless he is returned to the Embassy. He is being held in a deserted farmhouse — ALL you have to do is get him out! The program loads in two parts — your rating in part two depends on your skill in the first.
